title: Physical Therapy Office Receptionist
description:
We are looking for a dedicated and enthusiastic Receptionist / Office Manager to join our team at Beyond Radix Physical Therapy for a remote position!

RESPONSIBILITIES  
Greets and assists all patients and visitors by telephone. Obtains patient information, data entry information into the practice management system and schedules patient appointments on daily basis. Checks in and out patients, collects payments, completes appointments and checks insurance authorization requirements. Filing, scanning and organizing patient files on daily basis as per the protocols. Maintains a safe, secure, healthy and friendly work environment.

\\-Knowledge, Skills and Abilities  
\\-Excellent customer service skills.  
\\-Bilingual in English and Spanish required.  
\\-Ability to think critically and analytically with little or no supervision.  
\\-Ability to work effectively in situations of high stress and conflict and communicate goals and outcomes.  
\\-Ability to process information and prioritize.  
\\-Possesses exceptional verbal and written communication skills.  
\\-Possesses independent work habits, is self\\-reliant and self\\-directed.  
\\-Ability to learn, adapt, and change as required by the job functions.  
\\-Ability to maintain absolute confidentiality of material and information accessed and reviewed.  
\\-Ability to use good body mechanics while performing daily job functions.  
\\-Ability to maintain attendance to meet standard job practices.  
\\-Medical terminology, knowledge of insurance and reimbursement procedures is a plus but not required.  
\\-Knowledge of third party payers, billing requirements and reimbursement methods is a plus but not required.  
\\-Prior accounts receivable, collections, or billing experience is a plus.  
\\- Perform other clerical receptionist duties such as filing, photocopying, transcribing and faxing.
